title: Siegecraft Defender v1.0.1 [PD]
description:
Build your own castle defense and protect the Knights from the evil Lizardmen!
ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Siegecraft built from the ground up for TD fans!

After nearly 2 years of peace from the great wars of Siegecraft, the usually reclusive Lizardmen have risen up against the Knights of Freemoi. What is the reason behind this uprising? 

Where are your allies, the Vikings and Samurai of Freemoi? Discover the answers to these questions and more in SIEGECRAFT DEFENDER!

+ Classic TD game play set in the beautiful world of Siegecraft. 
+ Over 1 Million people have enjoyed the world of Siegecraft to date! 
+ Dozens of enemies on screen at once, all rendered in amazing 3D! 
+ Real-time shadows and pixel shaders for your visual pleasure! 
+ 15 unique towers 
+ 18 unique units 
+ Over 30 levels 
+ Over 10 hours of campaign mode 
+ Endless single player maps for infinite game play 
+ Multiplayer for fun combat against your friends in local hotseat
+ Globally ranked multiplayer matches to prove you are the strategy Master!
